articles.title: Copa America 2021: Brazil new hosts as tournament moved from Argentina, Colombia - ESPN India
articles.description: The 2021 Copa America will be staged in Brazil after being moved from Colombia and then Argentina, CONMEBOL announced on Monday.
articles.content:
Brazil, winners in 2019, will host the 2021 Copa America. LUIS ACOSTA/AFP/Getty Images
CONMEBOL named Brazil as the host nation of the 47th Copa America on Monday.

articles.description: 31 May marks the centenary of a 1921 massacre targeting Tulsa's prosperous African-American community in the district of Greenwood, known as "Black Wall Street."
articles.content:
Lessie Benningfield Randle, 106, can still remember a house engulfed in flames and the bodies stacked on trucks, one hundred years later.

articles.title: US tyre maker Goodyear faces allegations of labour abuse in Malaysia, documents show - CNA
